Statute.Title: Canadian National Railways Financing and Guarantee Act, 1970 (for detail prior to 1970, see Table of Public Statutes, S.C., 1970-71-72)
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Chemins de fer nationaux du Canada (Financement et garantie), Loi de 1970 sur les)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1995, c. 24, s. 20 (Sch. II, items 5 and 6) in force on assent 13.07.95
